thread.title: Crazy custom laws around the world
thread.title_full: Crazy custom laws around the world

author: Staff Reporter
title: Crazy custom laws around the world
text:
Crazy custom laws around the world Article By: Staff Reporter Fri, 17 Jul 2015 3:40 PM Share Your Email Credit: freeimages.com/anshustock 
Every country has its own custom laws - but there are some out there that are downright crazy. You could be breaking them without even knowing... 
That's why Barrington Freight did some research into custom laws around the world - and they found some weird regulations. 
Luckily for us, they put these together in a great infographic for easy reading. 
Did you know pencils are banned from entering Tunisia? Meanwhile Malawi doesn't allow aphrodisiacs to be imported. 
Also, don't go thinking you can bring bottled mineral water into Benin. 
Have a look at more of these strange regulations below: Related Articles
